Articles.Content:
I know the MK2 space plane is supposed to look like the SR71, but I use a lot of the parts for drones. Right now, I use the MK2/1.25m adapter fueltank...but that's a fuel-tank and is heavy, even if I unload the fuel. Also, there is no good tail piece, what-so-ever.

Seems like a no brainer.

Here's one such design that would benefit highly since the center section wouldn't need to be used for fuel, at all. It could be light weight components, but since I must use fuel tanks for tails, or at least as adapters, I'm going to fill them with fuel.

![Af0lAdA.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Af0lAdA.jpg)

I still think some of these basic things should be in Vanilla.
